trans-unit.source: Returns the root directory of Erlang/OTP, which is the directory where it is installed.
trans-unit.target: 返回Erlang/OTP的根目录,也就是安装它的目录。

trans-unit.source: Returns the same as install_release/1. Descr defaults to "" if no relup file is found.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 install_release/1 相同。 Descr 默认为“”如果没有 relup 文件中找到。

trans-unit.source: Returns the same as statistics(active_tasks_all) with the exception that no information about the dirty IO run queue and its associated schedulers is part of the result. That is, only tasks that are expected to be CPU bound are part of the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 statistics(active_tasks_all) 相同的内容，但结果中不包含有关脏IO运行队列及其关联的调度程序的信息。也就是说，只有预期受CPU约束的任务才是结果的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns the same as statistics(active_tasks_all) with the exception that no information about the dirty IO run queue and its associated schedulers is part of the result. That is, only tasks that are expected to be CPU bound are part of the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 statistics(active_tasks_all) 相同的内容，但结果中不包含有关脏IO运行队列及其关联的调度程序的信息。也就是说，只有预期受CPU约束的任务才是结果的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Returns the same as statistics(run_queue_lengths_all) with the exception that no information about the dirty IO run queue is part of the result. That is, only run queues with work that is expected to be CPU bound is part of the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 statistics(run_queue_lengths_all) 相同的结果，不同之处在于结果中不包含有关脏IO运行队列的信息。也就是说，结果中只包含预期工作受CPU约束的运行队列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the same as statistics(run_queue_lengths_all) with the exception that no information about the dirty IO run queue is part of the result. That is, only run queues with work that is expected to be CPU bound is part of the result.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 statistics(run_queue_lengths_all) 相同的结果，不同之处在于结果中没有关于脏IO运行队列的信息。也就是说，结果中只包含预期工作受CPU约束的运行队列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the scheduler ID (SchedulerId) of the scheduler thread that the calling process is executing on. SchedulerId is a positive integer, where 1 <= SchedulerId <= erlang:system_info(schedulers).
trans-unit.target: 返回正在执行调用进程的调度程序线程的调度程序ID（ SchedulerId ）。 SchedulerId 是一个正整数，其中 1 <= SchedulerId <= erlang:system_info(schedulers) 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the segment size, N, of a bitstring_type node.
trans-unit.target: 返回段大小， N ，一个的 bitstring_type 节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server capabilities as received in its hello message.
trans-unit.target: 返回在其hello消息中收到的服务器能力。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server side capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器端能力。

trans-unit.source: Returns the session Id associated with the specified client.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定客户端相关联的会话ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the set containing every element of Set1 for which Fun returns true. If Fun is a tuple {external, Fun2}, Fun2 is applied to the external set of each element, otherwise Fun is applied to each element.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 Set1 的每个元素的集合，其中 Fun 返回 true 。如果 Fun 是一个元组 {external, Fun2} ，则 Fun2 应用于每个元素的 external set ，否则 Fun 应用于每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the set created by substituting each element of Set1 by the result of applying SetFun to the element.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过将 SetFun 应用于元素的结果来替换 Set1 的每个元素而创建的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Returns the size in bytes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of term as described above, or -1 if term is not one of the two supported types.
trans-unit.target: 返回如上所述的 term 的大小；如果 term 不是两种支持的类型之一，则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of Erlang term words in bytes as an integer, that is, 4 is returned on a 32-bit architecture, and 8 is returned on a pure 64-bit architecture. On a halfword 64-bit emulator, 4 is returned, as the Erlang terms are stored using a virtual word size of half the system word size.
trans-unit.target: 以字节为单位,以整数形式返回Erlang术语字的大小,即在32位架构上返回4,在纯64位架构上返回8,在半字64位仿真器上,返回4,因为Erlang术语使用系统字大小的一半虚拟字存储。在半字64位仿真器上,返回4,因为Erlang术语的虚拟字大小是系统字大小的一半。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定文件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size specifier subtree of a binary_field node, if any. If Node represents "Body:Size" or "Body:Size/T1, ..., Tn", the result is Size, otherwise none is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary_field 节点的大小说明符子树（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ Body:Size ”或“ Body:Size/T1, ..., Tn ”，则结果为 Size ，否则 none 返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size subtree of an abstract bit-string template.
trans-unit.target: 返回抽象位串模板的大小子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest element in Set. Assumes that Set is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Set 中的最小元素。假定 Set 不为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest integer not less than Number. For example:
trans-unit.target: 返回不小于 Number 的最小整数。例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest of Term1 and Term2. If the terms are equal, Term1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Term1 和 Term2 中的最小值。如果条件相等，则返回 Term1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1 and List2. Both List1 and List2 must be sorted according to the ordering functionFun and contain no duplicates before evaluating this function. Fun(A, B) is to return true if A compares less than or equal to B in the ordering, otherwise false. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1 is picked and the one from List2 is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 和 List2 形成的排序列表。这两个 List1 和 List2 必须按照排序 ordering function Fun 和评估包含此功能之前，没有重复。如果 A 在排序中小于或等于 B ，则 Fun(A, B) 返回 true ，否则返回 false 。当两个元素比较相等时，将选择 List2 List1 的元素，并删除列表2中的一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1 and List2. Both List1 and List2 must be sorted according to the ordering functionFun before evaluating this function. Fun(A, B) is to return true if A compares less than or equal to B in the ordering, otherwise false. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1 is picked before the element from List2.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 和 List2 形成的排序列表。这两个 List1 和 List2 必须按照排序 ordering function Fun 评估此功能之前。如果 A 在排序中小于或等于 B ，则 Fun(A, B) 返回 true ，否则返回 false 。当两个元素比较相等时，将选择 List1 中的元素，再选择 List2 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1 and List2. Both List1 and List2 must be sorted and contain no duplicates before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1 is picked and the one from List2 is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 和 List2 形成的排序列表。这两个 List1 和 List2 必须进行排序和评估该功能前不包含重复。当两个元素比较相等时，将选择 List2 List1 的元素，并删除列表2中的一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1 and List2. Both List1 and List2 must be sorted before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1 is picked before the element from List2.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 和 List2 形成的排序列表。这两个 List1 和 List2 必须评估该功能前进行排序。当两个元素比较相等时，将选择 List1 中的元素，再选择 List2 中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1, List2, and List3. All of List1, List2, and List3 must be sorted and contain no duplicates before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1 is picked if there is such an element, otherwise the element from List2 is picked, and the other is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 ， List2 和 List3 形成的排序列表。在评估此功能之前，必须对所有 List1 ， List2 和 List3 进行排序，并且不包含重复项。当两个元素比较相等时，如果存在这样的元素，则选择 List1 中的元素，否则，选择 List2 中的元素，然后删除另一个。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging List1, List2, and List3. All of List1, List2, and List3 must be sorted before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from List1, if there is such an element, is picked before the other element, otherwise the element from List2 is picked before the element from List3.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 List1 ， List2 和 List3 形成的排序列表。在评估此功能之前，必须对所有 List1 ， List2 和 List3 进行排序。当两个元素比较相等时，如果有这样的元素，则从 List1 的元素开始选择另一个元素，否则，从 List2 的元素开始选择来自 List3 的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging TupleList1 and TupleList2. The merge is performed on the Nth element of each tuple. Both TupleList1 and TupleList2 must be key-sorted before evaluating this function. When two tuples compare equal, the tuple from TupleList1 is picked before the tuple from TupleList2.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 TupleList1 和 TupleList2 形成的排序列表。合并是在每个元组的第 N 个元素上执行的。无论 TupleList1 和 TupleList2 必须键排序评估此功能之前。当两个元组比较相等时，将选择来自 TupleList1 的元组，然后选择来自 TupleList2 的元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging TupleList1 and TupleList2. The merge is performed on the Nth element of each tuple. Both TupleList1 and TupleList2 must be key-sorted without duplicates before evaluating this function. When two tuples compare equal, the tuple from TupleList1 is picked and the one from TupleList2 is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 TupleList1 和 TupleList2 形成的排序列表。合并是在每个元组的第 N 个元素上执行的。无论 TupleList1 和 TupleList2 必须键排序未评估此功能之前重复。当两个元组比较相等时，将选择来自 TupleList1 的元组，并删除来自 TupleList2 的元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging all the sublists of ListOfLists. All sublists must be sorted and contain no duplicates before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from the sublist with the lowest position in ListOfLists is picked and the other is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 ListOfLists 的所有子列表形成的排序列表。在评估此功能之前，必须对所有子列表进行排序，并且不包含重复项。当两个元素比较相等时，将选择子列表中 ListOfLists 中位置最低的元素，并删除另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sorted list formed by merging all the sublists of ListOfLists. All sublists must be sorted before evaluating this function. When two elements compare equal, the element from the sublist with the lowest position in ListOfLists is picked before the other element.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过合并 ListOfLists 的所有子列表形成的排序列表。在评估此功能之前，必须对所有子列表进行排序。当两个元素比较相等时，将从子列表中 ListOfLists 中位置最低的元素中选取另一个元素之前的元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns the source code filename File for an interpreted module Module.
trans-unit.target: 返回解释的模块 Module 的源代码文件名 File 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the stacktrace subtree of a class_qualifier node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 class_qualifier 节点的stacktrace子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state after performing jump calculation to the given state.
trans-unit.target: 执行跳转计算后返回给定状态的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state after performing jump calculation to the state in the process dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 将执行跳转计算后的状态返回到进程字典中的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state of the Inet configuration database in form of a list of recorded configuration parameters. For more information, see ERTS User's Guide: Inet Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 以记录的配置参数列表的形式返回 Inet 配置数据库的状态。有关更多信息，请参见《 ERTS User's Guide: Inet Configuration 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state of the time offset:
trans-unit.target: 返回时间偏移的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a cipher suite.
trans-unit.target: 返回密码套件的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sublist of List1 starting at Start and with (maximum) Len elements. It is not an error for Start+Len to exceed the length of the list.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List1 的子列表，该列表从 Start 开始,并带有（最大） Len 个元素。 Start+Len 超过列表的长度不是错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sublist of List1 starting at position 1 and with (maximum) Len elements. It is not an error for Len to exceed the length of the list, in that case the whole list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List1 的子列表，该列表从位置1开始且具有（最大） Len 个元素。 Len 超出列表的长度不是错误，在这种情况下，将返回整个列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the success body subtree of an abstract try-expression.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个抽象尝试表达式的成功体子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the suffix subtree of a list node, if one exists. If Node represents "[E1, ..., En | Tail]", the returned value is Tail, otherwise, i.e., if Node represents "[E1, ..., En]", none is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 list 节点的后缀子树（如果存在）。如果 Node 代表“ [E1, ..., En | Tail] ”，返回的值是 Tail ，否则，即如果 Node 代表“ [E1, ..., En] ”， none 返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of the elements in List.
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 中元素的总和。

trans-unit.source: Returns the symbol of Token.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的符号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the syntax tree corresponding to an Erlang term. Term must be a literal term, i.e., one that can be represented as a source code literal. Thus, it may not contain a process identifier, port, reference or function value as a subterm. The function recognises printable strings, in order to get a compact and readable representation. Evaluation fails with reason badarg if Term is not a literal term.
trans-unit.target: 返回与Erlang术语相对应的语法树。 Term 必须是文字术语，即可以表示为源代码文字的术语。因此，它可能不包含过程标识符，端口，引用或函数值作为子项。该函数识别可打印的字符串，以便获得紧凑且可读的表示形式。如果 Term 不是文字术语，则评估失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the syntax tree corresponding to an Erlang term. Term must be a literal term, i.e., one that can be represented as a source code literal. Thus, it may not contain a process identifier, port, reference, binary or function value as a subterm. The function recognises printable strings, in order to get a compact and readable representation. Evaluation fails with reason badarg if Term is not a literal term.
trans-unit.target: 返回与Erlang术语相对应的语法树。 Term 必须是文字术语，即可以表示为源代码文字的术语。因此，它可能不包含过程标识符，端口，引用，二进制或函数值作为子项。该函数识别可打印的字符串，以便获得紧凑且可读的表示形式。如果 Term 不是文字术语，则评估失败，原因为 badarg 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the system time for the given microstate statistics values. System time is the accumulated time of all threads.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定微状态统计值的系统时间。系统时间是所有线程的累计时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the table name given the pid of a process that handles requests to a table, or undefined if there is no such table.
trans-unit.target: 在给定处理表请求的进程的pid的情况下，返回表名；如果没有此类表，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tail item of queue Q.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列 Q 的尾项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tail of List, that is, the list minus the first element, for example:
trans-unit.target: 返回 List 的尾部，即list减去第一个元素，例如：

trans-unit.source: Returns the tail of a list node. If Node represents a single-element list "[E]", then the result has type nil, representing "[]". If Node represents "[E1, E2 ...]", the result will represent "[E2 ...]", and if Node represents "[Head | Tail]", the result will represent "Tail".
trans-unit.target: 返回 list 节点的尾部。如果 Node 表示单元素列表“ [E] ”，则结果的类型为 nil ，表示“ [] ”。如果 Node 表示“ [E1, E2 ...] ”，则结果将表示“ [E2 ...] ”，如果 Node 表示“ [Head | Tail] ”，则结果将表示“ Tail ”。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tail subtree of an abstract list constructor.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个抽象列表构造函数的尾部子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template subtree of a binary_comp node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 binary_comp 节点的模板子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template subtree of a list_comp node.
trans-unit.target: 返回 list_comp 节点的模板子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the term representing the annotations Anno.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表注释Anno的术语。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text of Token's collection of annotations. If there is no text, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Token 的注释集合的文本。如果没有文本，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the text of the annotations Anno. If there is no text, undefined is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回批注“ Anno”的文本。如果没有文本，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the thread identifier of the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 返回调用线程的线程标识符。

trans-unit.source: Returns the thread-specific data associated with key for the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用线程的 key 关联的特定于线程的数据。

trans-unit.source: Returns the threshold, in percent, for disk space utilization.
trans-unit.target: 返回磁盘空间利用率的阈值,以百分比为单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the threshold, in percent, for process memory allocation.
trans-unit.target: 返回进程内存分配的阈值,百分比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the threshold, in percent, for system memory allocation.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统内存分配的阈值,百分比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the time interval, in milliseconds, for the periodic disk space check.
trans-unit.target: 返回定期磁盘空间检查的时间间隔,以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the time interval, in milliseconds, for the periodic memory check.
trans-unit.target: Returns the time interval,in milliseconds,for the periodic memory check。

trans-unit.source: Returns the timeout subtree of a receive_expr node, if any. If Node represents "receive C1; ...; Cn end", none is returned. Otherwise, if Node represents "receive C1; ...; Cn after Timeout -> ... end", Timeout is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回 receive_expr 节点的超时子树（如果有）。如果 Node 表示“ receive C1; ...; Cn end ”， none 返回任何内容。否则，如果 Node 表示“ receive C1; ...; Cn after Timeout -> ... end ”，则返回 Timeout 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the timeout subtree of an abstract receive-expression.
trans-unit.target: 返回抽象接收表达式的超时子树。

trans-unit.source: Returns the timeout value, in seconds, for memory checks.
trans-unit.target: 返回内存检查的超时值,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total length of all normal and dirty CPU run queues. That is, queued work that is expected to be CPU bound. The information is gathered atomically. That is, the result is a consistent snapshot of the state, but this operation is much more expensive compared to statistics(total_run_queue_lengths), especially when a large amount of schedulers is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有正常和脏CPU运行队列的总长度。也就是说，排队的工作预计将受CPU限制。该信息是原子收集的。也就是说，结果是状态的一致快照，但是与 statistics(total_run_queue_lengths) 相比，此操作要昂贵得多，尤其是在使用大量调度程序时。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total length of all normal run-queues. That is, the number of processes and ports that are ready to run on all available normal run-queues. Dirty run queues are not part of the result. The information is gathered atomically. That is, the result is a consistent snapshot of the state, but this operation is much more expensive compared to statistics(total_run_queue_lengths), especially when a large amount of schedulers is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有正常运行队列的总长度。也就是说，准备在所有可用的正常运行队列上运行的进程和端口的数量。肮脏的运行队列不是结果的一部分。该信息是原子收集的。也就是说，结果是状态的一致快照，但是与 statistics(total_run_queue_lengths) 相比，此操作要昂贵得多，尤其是在使用大量调度程序时。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total number of context switches since the system started.
trans-unit.target: 返回自系统启动以来上下文切换的总次数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the total size in bits of an abstract bit-string template. If the size field is an integer literal, the result is the product of the size and unit values; if the size field is the atom literal all, the atom all is returned. If the size is not a literal, the atom any is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回抽象位字符串模板的总大小（以位为单位）。如果size字段是整数文字，则结果为size和单位值的乘积；否则，结果为整数。如果size字段是原义原子 all ,则返回原义 all 。如果大小不是文字，则返回原子 any 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the true word size of the emulator, that is, the size of a pointer. The value is given in bytes as an integer. On a pure 32-bit architecture, 4 is returned. On both a half word and on a pure 64-bit architecture, 8 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回仿真器的真实字数,也就是一个指针的大小。该值是以字节为单位的整数。在纯32位架构上,返回4。在半字和纯64位架构上,返回8。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tuple {MegaSecs, Secs, MicroSecs}, which is the elapsed time since 00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970 (zero hour), if provided by the underlying OS. Otherwise some other point in time is chosen. It is also guaranteed that the following calls to this BIF return continuously increasing values. Hence, the return value from erlang:now/0 can be used to generate unique time stamps. If it is called in a tight loop on a fast machine, the time of the node can become skewed.
trans-unit.target: 返回元组 {MegaSecs, Secs, MicroSecs} ，如果基础操作系统提供了该时间，则该时间是格林尼治标准时间1970年1月1日00:00以来的经过时间（零小时）。否则，将选择其他时间点。还可以确保以下对该BIF的调用返回不断增加的值。因此，来自 erlang:now/0 的返回值可用于生成唯一的时间戳。如果在快速计算机上的紧密循环中调用它，则节点的时间可能会出现偏差。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type in *type and size in *size of the encoded term. For strings and atoms, size is the number of characters not including the terminating NULL. For binaries and bitstrings, *size is the number of bytes. For lists, tuples and maps, *size is the arity of the object. For bignum integers, *size is the number of bytes for the absolute value of the bignum. For other types, *size is 0. In all cases, index is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 以编码类型的 *type 返回类型，以 *size 返回大小。对于字符串和原子，size是不包括终止 NULL 的字符数。对于二进制和位串， *size 是字节数。对于列表，元组和地图， *size 是对象的单位。对于bignum整数， *size 是bignum的绝对值的字节数。对于其他类型， *size 为0。在所有情况下， index 均保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type in type and size in size of the encoded term. For strings and atoms, size is the number of characters not including the terminating NULL. trans-unit.source: Reuses a specific session. trans-unit.target: 重用特定的会话。如果自OTP-21.3起使用会话 {reuse_sessions, save} 保存该会话，则应以其会话ID引用该会话，或者自OTP-22.3起由其会话ID和相关数据明确指定该会话。另请参阅 SSL's Users Guide, Session Reuse pre TLS 1.3

trans-unit.source: Revert a template to a normal syntax tree. Any remaining metavariables are turned into @-prefixed atoms or 909-prefixed integers.

trans-unit.source: Reverts a sequence of Erlang source code forms. The sequence can be given either as a form_list syntax tree (possibly nested), or as a list of "program form" syntax trees. If successful, the corresponding flat list of erl_parse-compatible syntax trees is returned (see revert/1). If some program form could not be reverted, {error, Form} is thrown. Standalone comments in the form sequence are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 还原一系列Erlang源代码形式。该序列可以作为 form_list 语法树（可能是嵌套的）或“程序形式”语法树的列表给出。如果成功，则返回 erl_parse 兼容语法树的相应平面列表（请参阅 revert/1 ）。如果某些程序形式无法还原，则抛出 {error, Form} 。表单序列中的独立注释将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Run your applications with different scenarios (the more the better) and save information about each scenario by calling save_scenario/0. It may be hard to know when the applications are at an (for erts_alloc_config) important runtime scenario. A good approach may therefore be to call save_scenario/0 repeatedly, e.g. once every tenth second. Note that it is important that your applications reach the runtime scenarios that are important for erts_alloc_config when you are saving scenarios; otherwise, the configuration may perform bad.
trans-unit.target: 在不同的方案中运行您的应用程序（越多越好），并通过调用 save_scenario/0 保存有关每个方案的信息。可能很难知道应用程序何时处于（对于 erts_alloc_config 而言）重要的运行时场景。因此，一个好的方法可能是重复调用 save_scenario/0 ，例如每十秒钟一次。注意，在保存方案时，应用程序必须到达对 erts_alloc_config 至关重要的运行时方案，这一点很重要；否则，配置可能会变差。

trans-unit.source: Runs CommandString as an external command, if testing is enabled. Unless the output produced by the command exactly matches the specified string Text, an informative exception will be generated. (Note that the output is normalized to use a single LF character as line break on all platforms.) If there is no exception, the result of the macro expression is the atom ok. If testing is disabled, the macro will not generate any code except the atom ok, and the command will not be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了测试，则将 CommandString 作为外部命令运行。除非命令产生的输出与指定的字符串 Text 完全匹配，否则将生成提示性异常。（请注意，在所有平台上，输出都被标准化为使用单个LF字符作为换行符。）如果没有异常，则宏表达式的结果为 ok 。如果禁用了测试，则该宏将不会生成除原子 ok 之外的任何代码，并且该命令将不会执行。

trans-unit.source: Runs CommandString as an external command, if testing is enabled. Unless the returned status value is 0, an informative exception will be generated. If there is no exception, the result of the macro expression is the atom ok. If testing is disabled, the macro will not generate any code except the atom ok, and the command will not be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了测试，则将 CommandString 作为外部命令运行。除非返回的状态值为0，否则将生成信息性异常。如果没有异常，则宏表达式的结果为 ok 。如果禁用了测试，则该宏将不会生成除原子 ok 之外的任何代码，并且该命令将不会执行。

trans-unit.source: Runs CommandString as an external command. Unless the returned status value is 0 (indicating success), an informative exception will be generated; otherwise, the result of the macro expression is the output produced by the command, as a flat string. The output is normalized to use a single LF character as line break on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 将 CommandString 作为外部命令运行。除非返回的状态值为0（表示成功），否则将生成信息性异常。否则，宏表达式的结果将是命令产生的输出，以纯字符串形式。在所有平台上，将输出标准化为使用单个LF字符作为换行符。

trans-unit.source: Runs a pseudo server. This function never returns any value and the process that executes the function receives messages. All messages received are simply passed on to Pid.
trans-unit.target: 运行伪服务器。该函数从不返回任何值，并且执行该函数的进程会接收消息。收到的所有消息都简单地传递给 Pid 。

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified test cases.
trans-unit.target: 运行指定的测试用例。

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified tests in a separate subprocess, while the current test process waits for it to finish. This is useful for tests that need a fresh, isolated process state. (Note that EUnit always starts at least one such a subprocess automatically; tests are never executed by the caller's own process.)
trans-unit.target: 在一个单独的子进程中运行指定的测试,而当前测试进程则等待其完成。这对于需要一个新鲜的、隔离的进程状态的测试是很有用的。(注意,EUnit总是自动启动至少一个这样的子进程;测试永远不会由调用者自己的进程执行。)

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified tests in parallel (if possible). Also see {inorder, Tests}.
trans-unit.target: 并行运行指定的测试（如果可能）。另请参见 {inorder, Tests} 。

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified tests in strict order. Also see {inparallel, Tests}. By default, tests are neither marked as inorder or inparallel, but may be executed as the test framework chooses.
trans-unit.target: 严格运行指定的测试。另请参见 {inparallel, Tests} 。默认情况下，测试既不标记为 inorder 或 inparallel ，但也可以作为测试框架选被执行。

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified tests under the given timeout. Time is in seconds; e.g., 60 means one minute and 0.1 means 1/10th of a second. If the timeout is exceeded, the unfinished tests will be forced to terminate. Note that if a timeout is set around a fixture, it includes the time for setup and cleanup, and if the timeout is triggered, the entire fixture is abruptly terminated (without running the cleanup). The default timeout for an individual test is 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的超时时间内运行指定的测试,时间以秒为单位,例如60表示一分钟,0.1表示1/10秒。时间以秒为单位,例如,60表示一分钟,0.1表示1/10秒。如果超过了超时时间,未完成的测试将被迫终止。请注意,如果围绕灯具设置了超时,它包括设置和清理的时间,如果超时被触发,整个灯具将突然终止(不运行清理)。单个测试的默认超时时间为5秒。

trans-unit.source: SSH Connection Protocol: General
trans-unit.target: SSH连接协议:普通协议

trans-unit.source: SSH is a protocol for secure remote logon and other secure network services over an insecure network.
trans-unit.target: SSH是在不安全的网络上进行安全远程登录和其他安全网络服务的协议。

trans-unit.source: SSH password authentication
trans-unit.target: SSH密码认证

trans-unit.source: SSH provides a single, full-duplex, and byte-oriented connection between client and server. The protocol also provides privacy, integrity, server authentication, and man-in-the-middle protection.
trans-unit.target: SSH在客户端和服务器之间提供了一个单一的、全双工的、面向字节的连接。该协议还提供隐私、完整性、服务器认证和中间人保护。

trans-unit.source: SSH public key authentication
trans-unit.target: SSH公钥认证

trans-unit.source: SSH services (clients and servers) are implemented as channels that are multiplexed over an SSH connection and communicates over the SSH Connection Protocol. This module provides a callback API that takes care of generic channel aspects for clients, such as flow control and close messages. It lets the callback functions take care of the service (application) specific parts. This behavior also ensures that the channel process honors the principal of an OTP-process so that it can be part of a supervisor tree. This is a requirement of channel processes implementing a subsystem that will be added to the ssh applications supervisor tree.
trans-unit.target: SSH服务（客户端和服务器）被实现为通过SSH连接多路复用并通过 SSH Connection Protocol 通信的通道。该模块提供了一个回调API，用于处理客户端的通用通道方面，例如流控制和关闭消息。它使回调函数可以处理服务（应用程序）特定的部分。此行为还确保了通道进程遵守OTP进程的主体，以便它可以成为主管树的一部分。这是实现子系统的通道进程的要求，该子系统将添加到 ssh 应用程序管理器树中。

trans-unit.source: SSH services (clients and servers) are implemented as channels that are multiplexed over an SSH connection and communicates over the SSH Connection Protocol. This module provides a callback API that takes care of generic channel aspects for daemons, such as flow control and close messages. It lets the callback functions take care of the service (application) specific parts. This behavior also ensures that the channel process honors the principal of an OTP-process so that it can be part of a supervisor tree. This is a requirement of channel processes implementing a subsystem that will be added to the ssh applications supervisor tree.
trans-unit.target: SSH服务（客户端和服务器）被实现为通过SSH连接多路复用并通过 SSH Connection Protocol 通信的通道。该模块提供了一个回调API，用于处理守护程序的通用通道方面，例如流控制和关闭消息。它使回调函数可以处理服务（应用程序）特定的部分。此行为还确保了通道进程遵守OTP进程的主体，以便它可以成为主管树的一部分。这是实现子系统的通道进程的要求，该子系统将添加到 ssh 应用程序管理器树中。

trans-unit.source: SSH typically uses PEM files for private keys but has its own file format for storing public keys. The public_key application can be used to parse the content of SSH public-key files.
trans-unit.target: SSH通常使用PEM文件作为私钥，但具有自己的文件格式来存储公钥。该 public_key 应用程序可以用来解析SSH公共密钥文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: SSH uses different sets of algorithms in different phases of a session. Which algorithms to use is negotiated by the client and the server at the beginning of a session. See RFC 4253, "The Secure Shell (SSH) Transport Layer Protocol" for details.
trans-unit.target: SSH在会话的不同阶段使用不同的算法集。在会话开始时，客户端和服务器会协商使用哪种算法。有关详细信息，请参见 RFC 4253 ，“安全Shell（SSH）传输层协议”。

trans-unit.source: Same as block_call/4, but with a time-out value in the same manner as call/5.
trans-unit.target: 与 block_call/4 相同，但是具有与 call/5 相同的超时值。

trans-unit.source: Same as call/4, but the RPC server at Node does not create a separate process to handle the call. Thus, this function can be used if the intention of the call is to block the RPC server from any other incoming requests until the request has been handled. The function can also be used for efficiency reasons when very small fast functions are evaluated, for example, BIFs that are guaranteed not to suspend.
trans-unit.target: 与 call/4 相同，但是 Node 上的RPC服务器不会创建单独的进程来处理该调用。因此，如果调用的目的是阻止RPC服务器接收任何其他传入请求，直到该请求已被处理，则可以使用此功能。当评估非常小的快速功能时，例如出于保证不会挂起的BIF，出于效率原因，也可以使用该功能。

trans-unit.source: Same as the corresponding Erlang BIFs (or operators). In case of bad arguments, the result depends on the context. trans-unit.source: Sane compiler's calling conventions probably make these changes necessary only for a driver to handle data chunks that require 64-bit size fields (mostly larger than 2 GB, as that is what an int of 32 bits can hold). But it is possible to think of non-sane calling conventions that would make the driver callbacks mix up the arguments causing malfunction.
trans-unit.target: Sane编译器的调用约定可能仅使驱动程序能够处理需要64位大小的字段（大多大于2 GB，因为这可以容纳32位 int 的数据块，才需要进行这些更改。但是可以考虑使用非理智的调用约定，这些约定会使驱动程序回调混淆导致故障的参数。

trans-unit.source: Scheduling is pre-emptive. Regardless of priority, a process is pre-empted when it has consumed more than a certain number of reductions since the last time it was selected for execution.
trans-unit.target: 排程是先发制人的。无论优先级如何,当一个进程自上次被选中执行后,消耗的减量超过一定数量时,该进程就会被抢占。

trans-unit.target: 在代码路径中的所有目录中搜索具有相同名称的模块名称，并将报告写入 stdout 。

trans-unit.source: Searches for Name, globally registered on the specified node or in the specified global group, or (if argument Where is not provided) in any global group. The global groups are searched in the order that they appear in the value of configuration parameter global_groups.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 Name ，该Name在指定节点或指定全局组中全局注册，或在任何全局组中（如果未提供参数 Where 的情况下）注册。按照在配置参数 global_groups 的值中出现的顺序搜索全局组。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a key in a dictionary. Returns {ok, Value}, where Value is the value associated with Key, or error if the key is not present in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在字典中搜索关键字。返回 {ok, Value} ，其中 Value 是与 Key 关联的值，如果字典中不存在该键，则返回 error 。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a key in dictionary Dict. Returns {ok, Value}, where Value is the value associated with Key, or error if the key is not present in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在字典 Dict 中搜索键。返回 {ok, Value} ，其中 Value 是与 Key 关联的值，如果字典中不存在该键，则返回 error 。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 搜索指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the first occurrence of Pattern in Subject and returns the position and length.
trans-unit.target: 搜索的第一次出现 Pattern 在 Subject 并返回的位置和长度。

trans-unit.source: Searches the code path for Filename, a file of arbitrary type. If found, the full name is returned. non_existing is returned if the file cannot be found. The function can be useful, for example, to locate application resource files.
trans-unit.target: 在代码路径中搜索 Filename ，这是任意类型的文件。如果找到，则返回全名。如果找不到文件，则返回 non_existing 。该功能可能很有用，例如，查找应用程序资源文件。

trans-unit.source: Searches the code path for EEP-48 style documentation and returns it if available. If no documentation can be found the function tries to generate documentation from the debug information in the module. If no debug information is available, this function will return {error,missing}.
trans-unit.target: 在代码路径中搜索EEP-48样式文档，如果有，则将其返回。如果找不到文档，则该函数尝试从模块中的调试信息生成文档。如果没有可用的调试信息，则此函数将返回 {error,missing} 。

trans-unit.source: Searches the code path for the object code of module Module. Returns {Module, Binary, Filename} if successful, otherwise error. Binary is a binary data object, which contains the object code for the module. This can be useful if code is to be loaded on a remote node in a distributed system. For example, loading module Module on a node Node is done as follows:
trans-unit.target: 在代码路径中搜索模块 Module 的目标代码。如果成功，则返回 {Module, Binary, Filename} ，否则返回 error 。 Binary 是二进制数据对象，其中包含模块的对象代码。如果要在分布式系统中的远程节点上加载代码，这将很有用。例如，将模块 Module 加载到节点 Node 上的操作如下：

trans-unit.source: Searches the list of tuples TupleList1 for a tuple whose Nth element compares equal to Key. Returns {value, Tuple, TupleList2} if such a tuple is found, otherwise false. TupleList2 is a copy of TupleList1 where the first occurrence of Tuple has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 在元组 TupleList1 的列表中搜索其第 N 个元素与 Key 相等的元组。如果找到这样的元 {value, Tuple, TupleList2} 返回{value，Tuple，TupleList2}，否则返回 false 。 TupleList2 是副本 TupleList1 ，其中第一次出现的 Tuple 已被删除。

trans-unit.source: Searches the list of tuples TupleList for a tuple whose Nth element compares equal to Key. Returns Tuple if such a tuple is found, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 在元组列表 TupleList 中搜索一个元组，该元组的第 N 个元素比较等于 Key 。如果找到这样的元组，则返回 Tuple ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Searches the list of tuples TupleList for a tuple whose Nth element compares equal to Key. Returns {value, Tuple} if such a tuple is found, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 在元组列表 TupleList 中搜索一个元组，该元组的第 N 个元素比较等于 Key 。如果找到这样的元组，则返回 {value, Tuple} ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Searches the path Path (a list of directory names) until the file Filename is found. If Filename is an absolute filename, Path is ignored. Then opens the file in the mode determined by Modes.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径 Path （目录名称列表），直到找到文件 Filename 。如果 Filename 是绝对文件名，则忽略 Path 。然后以 Modes 确定的模式打开文件。

trans-unit.source: Searches the path Path (a list of directory names) until the file Filename is found. If Filename is an absolute filename, Path is ignored. Then reads Erlang terms, separated by '.', from the file.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径 Path （目录名称列表），直到找到文件 Filename 。如果 Filename 是绝对文件名，则忽略 Path 。然后从文件中读取以“。”分隔的Erlang术语。

trans-unit.source: Searches the path Path (a list of directory names) until the file Filename is found. If Filename is an absolute filename, Path is ignored. Then reads and evaluates Erlang expressions, separated by '.' (or ',', a sequence of expressions is also an expression), from the file.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径 Path （目录名称列表），直到找到文件 Filename 。如果 Filename 是绝对文件名，则忽略 Path 。然后读取并评估以“。”分隔的Erlang表达式。（或'，'，表达式序列也是表达式），来自文件。

trans-unit.source: Searches the path Path (a list of directory names) until the file Filename is found. If Filename is an absolute filename, Path is ignored. Then reads and evaluates Erlang expressions, separated by '.' (or ',', a sequence of expressions is also an expression), from the file. The result of evaluation is not returned; any expression sequence in the file must be there for its side effect.
trans-unit.target: 搜索路径 Path （目录名称列表），直到找到文件 Filename 。如果 Filename 是绝对文件名，则忽略 Path 。然后读取并评估以“。”分隔的Erlang表达式。（或'，'，表达式序列也是表达式），来自文件。评估结果不返回；文件中的任何表达序列都必须存在，以产生副作用。

trans-unit.source: Second, its possible to effect the global default value by setting the environment variable ESOCK_USE_SOCKET_REGISTRY (boolean) before starting the erlang.
trans-unit.target: 其次，可以通过在启动erlang之前设置环境变量 ESOCK_USE_SOCKET_REGISTRY （布尔值）来实现全局默认值。

trans-unit.source: Second, you need to consider the sustained failure rate, if crashes keep happening but not often enough to make the supervisor give up. If you set intensity to 10 and set the period as low as 1, the supervisor will allow child processes to keep restarting up to 10 times per second, forever, filling your logs with crash reports until someone intervenes manually.
trans-unit.target: 其次,你需要考虑持续故障率,如果崩溃一直发生,但频率不足以让主管放弃。如果你将强度设置为10,并将周期设置为低至1,那么主管会允许子进程每秒不断重启10次,永远如此,让你的日志中充满了崩溃报告,直到有人手动干预。

The refresh interval is set per viewer so you can have different settings for each viewer. To minimize the system impact, only the active viewer is updated. Other views are updated when activated.
trans-unit.target: 通过菜单节点选择要观察的节点。菜单视图>刷新间隔可控制视图的更新频率。刷新间隔是为每个查看器设置的，因此您可以为每个查看器设置不同的设置。为了最大程度地减少对系统的影响，仅更新活动的查看器。激活后，其他视图也会更新。

trans-unit.source: Select/Match Operations
trans-unit.target: 选择/匹配操作

trans-unit.source: Select/match operations on Ets and Mnesia tables can become very expensive operations. They usually need to scan the complete table. Try to structure the data to minimize the need for select/match operations. However, if you require a select/match operation, it is still more efficient than using tab2list. Examples of this and of how to avoid select/match are provided in the following sections. The functions ets:select/2 and mnesia:select/3 are to be preferred over ets:match/2, ets:match_object/2, and mnesia:match_object/3.
trans-unit.target: Ets和Mnesia表上的选择/匹配操作可能会变得非常昂贵。他们通常需要扫描整个表。尝试构造数据以最大程度地减少选择/匹配操作的需求。但是，如果您需要选择/匹配操作，它仍然比使用 tab2list 更有效。以下各节提供了有关此示例以及如何避免选择/匹配的示例。与 ets:match/2 ， ets:match_object/2 和 mnesia:match_object/3 相比，函数 ets:select/2 和 mnesia:select/3 更可取。

trans-unit.source: Selection between +fnl and +fnu is done based on the current locale settings in the OS. This means that if you have set your terminal for UTF-8 encoding, the filesystem is expected to use the same encoding for filenames. This is default on all operating systems, except MacOS X and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 之间的选择 +fnl 和 +fnu 是基于操作系统的当前区域设置完成。这意味着，如果您已将终端设置为UTF-8编码，则文件系统应该对文件名使用相同的编码。这是除MacOS X和Windows以外的所有操作系统上的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Selection between +fnl and +fnu is done based on the current locale settings in the OS. This means that if you have set your terminal for UTF-8 encoding, the filesystem is expected to use the same encoding for filenames. This is the default on all operating systems, except Android, MacOS X and Windows.
trans-unit.target: 之间的选择 +fnl 和 +fnu 是基于操作系统的当前区域设置完成。这意味着，如果您已将终端设置为UTF-8编码，则文件系统应该对文件名使用相同的编码。这是所有操作系统（Android，MacOS X和Windows除外）的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Selection strategy, determines at which row in the result set to start the selection.
trans-unit.target: 选择策略,决定在结果集中的哪一行开始选择。

trans-unit.source: Selects N consecutive rows of the result set. If Position is next it is semantically equivalent of calling next/[1,2]N times. If Position is {relative, Pos}, Pos will be used as an offset from the current cursor position to determine the first selected row. If Position is {absolute, Pos}, Pos will be the number of the first row selected. After this function has returned the cursor is positioned at the last selected row. If there is less then N rows left of the result set the length of Rows will be less than N. If the first row to select happens to be beyond the last row of the result set, the returned value will be {selected, ColNames,[]} e.i. the list of row values is empty indicating that there is no more data to fetch.
trans-unit.target: 选择结果集中的 N 个连续行。如果 Position 为 next ，则从语义上讲等效于调用 next/[1,2] N 次。如果 Position 是 {relative, Pos} ， Pos 将用作当前光标位置的偏移量，以确定第一行被选择。如果 Position 为 {absolute, Pos} ，则 Pos 将是所选第一行的编号。此函数返回后，光标将位于最后选择的行。如果存在小于 N 左结果的行设定的长度 Rows 将小于 N 。如果要选择的第一行恰好在结果集的最后一行之外，则返回的值将为 {selected, ColNames,[]} 。行值列表为空，指示没有更多数据可提取。

trans-unit.source: Selects a "best" layout for a document, creating a corresponding fixed-layout document. If no layout could be produced, the atom empty is returned instead. For details about PaperWidth and LineWidth, see format/3. The function is idempotent.
trans-unit.target: 为文档选择“最佳”布局，从而创建相应的固定布局文档。如果无法产生布局，则返回原子 empty 。有关 PaperWidth 和 LineWidth 的详细信息，请参阅 format/3 。该函数是幂等的。

trans-unit.source: Selects a group for Diffie-Hellman key exchange with the key size in the range MinSize...MaxSize and as close to SuggestedSize as possible. If Groups == undefined a default set will be used, otherwise the group is selected from Groups.
trans-unit.target: 选择对的Diffie-Hellman与该范围内的密钥长度的密钥交换一组 MinSize...MaxSize 和接近 SuggestedSize 越好。如果 Groups == undefined 将使用默认设置，否则从 Groups 中选择该组。

trans-unit.source: Selects a single clause, if possible, or otherwise reduces the list of selectable clauses. The input is a list Clauses of abstract clauses (i.e., syntax trees of type clause), and a list of switch expressions Exprs. The function tries to uniquely select a single clause or discard unselectable clauses, with respect to the switch expressions. All abstract clauses in the list must have the same number of patterns. If Exprs is not the empty list, it must have the same length as the number of patterns in each clause; see match_list/2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个子句（如果可能），否则减少可选子句的列表。输入是一个列表 Clauses 抽象条款（即，类型的语法树的 clause ），以及开关表达式列表 Exprs 。该函数尝试相对于switch表达式唯一地选择一个子句或放弃不可选择的子句。列表中的所有抽象子句必须具有相同数量的模式。如果 Exprs 不是空列表，则它的长度必须与每个子句中的模式数相同；有关详细信息，请参见 match_list/2 。

trans-unit.source: Selects an instrumented Erlang runtime system (virtual machine) to run, instead of the ordinary one. When running an instrumented runtime system, some resource usage data can be obtained and analyzed using the instrument module. Functionally, it behaves exactly like an ordinary Erlang runtime system.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个已安装的Erlang运行时系统（虚拟机），而不是普通的系统。当运行有工具的运行时系统时，可以使用 instrument 模块获取并分析一些资源使用情况数据。在功能上，它的行为完全类似于普通的Erlang运行时系统。

trans-unit.source: Senders of data to the socket are suspended if either the socket message queue is busy or the socket itself is busy.
